TEE-based approach provides practical balance of privacy, performance, and compatibility
Multi-layer architecture (Parachain + TEE Sidechain + Relay Chain) enables both public and private state management
Substrate framework choice ensures interoperability within Polkadot ecosystem
Open-source codebase and active development indicate mature, production-ready project
